data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 6,735 believers in the county of Shahid Bhagat Singh Nagar to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shahid Bhagat Singh Nagar, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Shahid Bhagat Singh Nagar
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 598,135 lost people in  Shahid Bhagat Singh Nagar, Punjab, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, help the 6,735 believers in Shahid Bhagat Singh Nagar to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jat Sohi people might believe through him.
Father, for those in trouble in the county of Shahid Bhagat Singh Nagar prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Shahid Bhagat Singh Nagar, Punjab, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.focus_label: Shahid Bhagat Singh Nagar, Punjab, India

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Shahid Bhagat Singh Nagar to exponentially multiply disciples.
